comment.body: 1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ is mine and it's fine, it's just slow because I'm uploading 130GB at 60kb/s. I'm looking for better internet, but that might take at least a month.
@PolarüçÄ‚òòÔ∏èüåøüåæüå¥: I wasn't aware of that issue, hope it gets fixed soon

This news, sad as it may be, is a good reminder as to why we are here. And this should probably serve as encouragement to spread awareness of what decentralization can offer. I do fear our technology isn't ready yet for sites the size of sadpanda. This isn't anyone's fault, it's incredible what the zeronet developers and site developers have been able to realize.

###

On that note thank you @1pgallery for the new galleryhub version, without it managing a 2000+ sized hub was getting very painful. That's why I started a second hub instead of uploading to my old one. I wonder how big I can make it now before it gets too slow? If I had to bet I'd say I could probably push it to 10k+ at least.
Not to preasure you or anything, but could you please make a "latest comments" tab or something? Maybe show number of comments for each gallery on the front page?

###

I had no idea things were that bad in the Netherlands, I would've thought considering their lax stance on drugs they'd be far more forgiving when it comes to cartoon drawings.
